STATUS_0001.description: Irradiation will slowly lower your health points, and your lost health won’t go back up to 100% even if you heal. You’ll need iodine pills to get your max health back to 100%.
STATUS_0001.name: Irradiated

STATUS_0002.description: When you’re burning, your health will rapidly decrease.
STATUS_0002.name: Burning

STATUS_0003.description: Missing a limb? Someone stabbed you with a knife? Well, now you’re bleeding. Bleeding will slowly reduce health each turn.
STATUS_0003.name: Bleeding
